title: Sainsbury’s
description: Sainsbury's is associated with a vibrant, eye-catching color palette that primarily includes the color EC8A00. This specific hue, a shade of orange, is prominently featured on their brand website (http://www.j-sainsbury.co.uk/) and has been acknowledged in their media toolkit (http://www.j-sainsbury.co.uk/media/media-toolkit/2011/sainsburys-logo/). The choice of color reflects the brand's lively and energetic image, making it easily recognizable to consumers.
